docblock.description: The ContentType middleware class sets the HTTP Content-Type header based on the received HTTP Accept header values.
docblock.long-description: It also includes the current API name and version into the X-Powered-By header

docblock.description: Sets the HTTP Content-Type header based on the Accept values
